5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Mu’awiyah bin Qurrah that his father said:“We were forbidden to form a row between two pillars at the time of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), and we would be repelled from them forcefully.”

chapter.ara-name: باب الصَّلاَةِ بَيْنَ السَّوَارِي فِي الصَّفِّ
chapter.eng-name: Prayer between two pillars in a row
